definition: The rise and fall of the nation concerns everyone (idiom). Everyone bears responsibility for the prosperity of society.

The first concern is affairs of state, enjoying the pleasure comes later. Quotation from essay On Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓記|岳阳楼记 by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4 yan1]

faithful patriots (idiom)
to bend to a task and spare no effort unto one's dying day (idiom); striving to the utmost one's whole life/with every breath in one's body, unto one's dying day

guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense

to flourish and decay/rise and fall
